title: Economics for Midwits
text:
A portrait Edward R. Tufte, godfather of charts. Art by Fred Guth and MidJourney.


Welcome

title: Colophon
text: Composed in ET Book, a free and open-sopurce typeface designed by Dmitry Krasny, Bonnie Scranton, and Edward Tufte; and Gyre Heros, a fontbased on the URW Nimbus Sans L kindly released by URW++ Design and Development Inc. under GFL. Based on Tufte-Latex and Quarto.
